title: 为什么Chest Commands GUI设置不了第二个菜单选项
author: tyx_89
txt_content:
menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&1快捷菜单：'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 6

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  command: 'menu'

  # auto-refresh - OPTIONAL
  # How frequently the menu will be refreshed, in seconds.
  # Useful if you have variables in items' descriptions.
  auto-refresh: 5

  # This command command will be execute when the menu is opened.
  # Supports all the icon command types.
  open-action: 'sound: note pling; tell: &eYou opened the example menu.'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only right-clicking with orange wool [35:1]
  open-with-item:
    id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


gospawn:
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  NAME: '&e回城'
  LORE:
    - '点我回城'
    - '同上'
  ID: 8
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
  
  
warpsc:
  COMMAND: 'warp sc'
  NAME: '&e前往生存区'
  LORE:
    - '点我前往生存区'
    - '同上'
  ID: 9
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
  
复制代码上方上传的是报错代码，主要是warpsc那个项目，添加之后就报错。


这样删了就不会报错：
menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&1dns服务器快捷菜单：'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 6

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  command: 'menu'

  # auto-refresh - OPTIONAL
  # How frequently the menu will be refreshed, in seconds.
  # Useful if you have variables in items' descriptions.
  auto-refresh: 5

  # This command command will be execute when the menu is opened.
  # Supports all the icon command types.
  open-action: 'sound: note pling; tell: &eYou opened the example menu.'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only right-clicking with orange wool [35:1]
  open-with-item:
    id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


gospawn:
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  NAME: '&e回城'
  LORE:
    - '点我回城'
    - '同上'
  ID: 8
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
  
复制代码

求解！

replies.author: ImagineBreaker
replies.txt_content: 请把出错节点的所有字符前面的空格删掉重新打一遍

replies.author: 白琥
replies.txt_content:
虽然没看懂你说的，但是CC菜单有编辑器
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-542949-1-1.html

希望能帮助到你

replies.author: tyx_89
replies.txt_content:
白琥 发表于 2017-8-5 11:45
虽然没看懂你说的，但是CC菜单有编辑器
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-542949-1-1.html
感谢分享

replies.author: tyx_89
replies.txt_content:
ImagineBreaker 发表于 2017-8-5 13:02
请把出错节点的所有字符前面的空格删掉重新打一遍
谢谢回复，我找到原因了Notepad++的编码格式错了我这要用ANSI格式编码才行
